creditline: Lent by David and Flinnina Dewey
description: standing red horse with white hindquarters and a white neck with red dots; black bridle; white, red, and black saddle; flower pattern on upper saddle and black circles on lower saddle; deep, crack-like opening along mane; no tail
medium: Red eathenware under a white slip; painted with cold pigments
title: Horse, one of a pair
